Jing's portfolio

Jing Chung

I have a deep passion for basketball, a soft spot for cats, and prioritize family above everything else.

GO! KartVR Come racing with us!

A VR racing game developed using Unity, synchronizing the car's motion with a dedicated chair.

My responsibilities included implementing multiplayer features, devising an interactive broadcast system, designing engaging in-scene events, and creating a user-friendly tutorial scene for seamless platform navigation.

At KVRF 2019 GO! KartVR

Our game was showcased at the KVRF event hosted in Korea during 2019.

Escape: A Maze Challenge Can You Escape?

Crafted through Unreal Engine 4, this maze game serves as a demonstration of an innovative 3D packaging technique, designed specifically for television broadcast systems.

In this project, my role involved creating various 3D image packing techniques and developing a game to showcase the innovative packaging methods developed by the Institute of Computer and Communication Engineering at the National Cheng Kung University, Taiwan.

Basketball tactic training system via VR!

The system exemplified VR's potential by allowing basketball players to practice tactics individually. Users design tactics on a 2D board via an Android app, transmitted to Unreal Engine 4 through a socket server, creating a 3D training environment.
